CustomField.formula: CASE(Sales_Product__c, "Business Connect Bundle",1, "Business Connect Bundle Security Edition",1, "Dedicated High-Speed Internet",1, "Dedicated HS Internet - Usage-Based",1, "Ethernet Services - E-LAN",1, "Hosted Enterprise Bundle",1, "Hosted Voice Connections Bundle Package",1, "Hosted Voice Services",1, "ISDN/PRI",1, "Managed Enterprise Bundle",1, "Managed Office Bundle",1, "Managed Office UC Bundle",1, "Network Services",1, "Novus",1, "SIP Solutions",1, "UC Cloud Voice",1, "Unify (MT Unify Cust Only)",1, "Voice T1",1, "VPN Solutions",1, 0) = 1
CustomField.label: Requires Access and Bandwidth
